trans-unit.source: Binds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> (or another <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> implementation).
trans-unit.target: Associa um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture" /> a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> (ou a outra implementação de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" />).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> associates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> associa um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> com um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> implementação.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is the primary implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interface for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] commanding system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> é a implementação principal do <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> a interface para o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ordenar o sistema.

trans-unit.source: In general, when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> is executed, the command is invoked, although the command behavior is further influenced by command-specific factors such as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> é executado, o comando é invocado, embora o comportamento do comando adicional é influenciado por fatores de comando específico, como o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: For more information on commanding, see the [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre comandos, consulte [Visão geral de comandos](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: When defining a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], there are two ways to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> na [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], há duas maneiras para especificar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.

trans-unit.source: The first way to establish a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> element, which enables a syntax to specify mouse actions and modifiers as a single string; for example, "CTRL+LeftClick".
trans-unit.target: O primeiro modo para estabelecer um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> na [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] é definir o <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> atributo do <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> elemento, que permite uma sintaxe especificar ações do mouse e modificadores como uma única cadeia de caracteres; por exemplo, "CTRL + LeftClick".

trans-unit.source: The second way is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> attribute of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> element.
trans-unit.target: A segunda maneira é definir o <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> atributo o <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Both ways of setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> are equivalent and modify the same underlying object, but there will be a conflict if both are used.
trans-unit.target: Ambos os modos de configuração de <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> são equivalentes e modificar o mesmo objeto subjacente, mas haverá um conflito se os dois são usados.

trans-unit.source: In the case when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> attributes are both set, the gesture is invalid.
trans-unit.target: No caso de quando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> atributos são definidos, o gesto é inválido.

trans-unit.source: In general, it is recommended that you use only the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], even if you do not specify modifiers; this avoids ambiguity, provides the most streamlined syntax, and provides the most straightforward representation for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, é recomendável que você use somente o <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> de atributo de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], mesmo se você não especificar modificadores; Isso evita a ambiguidade, fornece a sintaxe mais simplificada e fornece a representação mais simples para serialização.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> can be defined on a specific object or at the class level by registering a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> class.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> podem ser definidas em um objeto específico ou no nível de classe Registrando um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> no <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> classe.

trans-unit.source: The most typical way to define a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> is within the control template, setting the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A> property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] by declaring one or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> elements.
trans-unit.target: A maneira mais comum para definir um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> está dentro do modelo de controle, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A> propriedade [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] declarando um ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> elementos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> to bind a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> para associar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> para um <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: The command associated with the gesture.
trans-unit.target: O comando associado ao gesto.

trans-unit.source: The gesture associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: O gesto associado ao comando.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" /> class, using the specified command and mouse gesture.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" /> usando o comando e o gesto de mouse especificados.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to bind an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> using a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como associar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> com um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> usando um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser clonado.

trans-unit.source: Copies the base (non-animated) values of the properties of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Copia os valores base (não animados) das propriedades do objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser clonado.

trans-unit.source: Copies the current values of the properties of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Copia os valores atuais das propriedades do objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: The new object.
trans-unit.target: O novo objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gesture associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o gesto associado a essa <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: The gesture.
trans-unit.target: O gesto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> with or without a set of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> é um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> com ou sem um conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> does not need to have a modifier key associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> não precisa ter uma chave de modificador associada a ele.

trans-unit.source: The following example show how to create a binding between a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostram como criar uma associação entre um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> para um <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture" /> is set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture" /> é definido como <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser clonado.

trans-unit.source: Creates the instance a frozen clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> by using base (non-animated) property values.
trans-unit.target: Cria a instância um clone congelado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> especificado usando valores de propriedade base (não animados).

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser clonado.

trans-unit.source: Creates the current instance a frozen clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria a instância atual de um clone congelado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: If the object has animated dependency properties, their current animated values are copied.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto tiver propriedades de dependência animadas, seus valores animados atuais serão copiados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction" /> associado a esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: The mouse action.
trans-unit.target: A ação do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.None" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.None" />.

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> does not need to be associated with a modifier key.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de um <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> não precisa ser associado uma tecla modificadora.

trans-unit.source: So a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> by itself, such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.MiddleClick>, can be a valid <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Portanto um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> por si só, como <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.MiddleClick>, pode ser um válido <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a binding between a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> and a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar uma associação entre um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> e um <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction" />.
